name: 일진녀가 옆집에 이사왔다
description:
One day, visiting the house next door,

The person who moved in next door is none other than Sophia, who is in the same class!

Moreover, the next day, they are assigned to sit next to each other, continuing to interact.

The protagonist is confused about the feelings that develop as they spend time together.

What will happen to the relationship with Sophia?

- Features of this game
1) A game of dating with a Bully girl in South Korea
2) Three multi-endings depending on likability and choices
